input_text:
Job Title: Maintenance Engineer

Location: Calhoun, GA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Manufacturing

Description:
Maintenance Engineer / Supervisor / Manager
$95,000 -$125,000 + Further Management Training + Progression + 6% 401k Match + Fantastic Benefits & Healthcare plan 
Calhoun, Georgia (commutable from: Sugar Valley, Resaca, New Town, Redbud, Cash, Sonaraville, Adairsville and Shannon) 
Are you a Maintenance Engineer or Supervisor looking to step into a Maintenance Manager role offering leadership training and structured progress to become a Plant Manager in the future?
This is a unique opportunity to join a global organization, where you will develop and grow your own team as well as taking charge of multiple sites within a year. 
My client are market leaders in their industry and are currently going through a period of expansion. They have a great reputation for developing their staff and promoting from within. 
On offer is a hands on Maintenance Manager position where you will be responsible for carrying out maintenance and attending breakdowns. You will also be looking to double the size of your maintenance department and take on multisite responsibility in your first year. 
This role would suit a ambitious Maintenance Engineer with PLC troubleshooting experience, looking to put their own stamp on a reputable organization, whilst receiving further training from the corporate manager and progression. 
The role: three local sitesand lead a team of four maintenance professionalsyour PLC & troubleshooting expertise to optimize operations
The candidate: as a Maintenance Engineer or Supervisormanufacturing backgroundqualified
To apply for this role or to be considered for further roles, please click "Apply Now" or contact Elisse Moss at Rise Technical Recruitment.
Rise Technical Recruitment Ltd acts an employment agency for permanent roles and an employment business for temporary roles.
The salary advertised is the bracket available for this position. The actual salary paid will be dependent on your level of experience, qualifications and skill set. We are an equal opportunities employer and welcome applications from all suitable candidates.
Key Words: Process Manufacturing, Manager, PLC, Troubleshooting, Site, Supervisor, Engineer, Engineering, Team, Lead, Management, degree, Sugar Valley, Resaca, New Town, Redbud, Cash, Sonaraville, Adairsville and Shannon

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Maintenance Engineer
job_responsibilities: double the size of maintenance department
take on multisite responsibility in first year
lead a team of four maintenance professionals
optimize operations using PLC & troubleshooting expertise
